name: stage-timer-app
description: A flexible stage timer application for presentations and events
author: Positive Developer

scripts.build: cd vite-core && npm run build && cd .. && xcopy vite-core\dist\* public\ /E /Y
scripts.build-clean: npm run build && electron-builder --dir && node build-clean.js
scripts.build-installer: npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis && node build-clean.js
scripts.build-linux: npm run build && electron-builder --linux --config.linux.target=dir && node build-clean-linux.js
scripts.build-linux-clean: npm run build && electron-builder --linux --dir && node build-clean-linux.js
scripts.build-linux-appimage: npm run build && electron-builder --linux --config.linux.target=AppImage && node build-clean-linux.js

desktop.Name: Stage Timer App
desktop.Comment: A flexible stage timer application for presentations and events
